name: 1. Photography Example: New Lead in ClickUp

mapper.subject: {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}}, your reservation is confirmed
mapper.html:
Hi {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}},

We're writing you to let you know that your reservation for {{2.package}} photography on the date of {{formatDate(3.due_date; "MMMM D YYYY")}} has been confirmed.

Thank you for ordering & looking forward to meeting you!

Cheers,
Wojtek

mapper.subject: {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}}, your bill for {{2.package}} photography
mapper.html:
Hi {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}},

Your total for {{2.package}} photography on {{formatDate(3.due_date; "MMMM D YYYY")}} is ${{3.custom_fields.`Amount Paid`}}.

Cheers,
Wojtek

mapper.subject: {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}}, don't forget these!
mapper.html:
Hi {{3.custom_fields.FirstName}},

We can't wait to have you for your photography session! Before you come, make sure to bring the following:
1. A warm change of clothes
2. A smile!

Looking forward to seeing you.

Cheers,
Wojtek
